votebox.middle.ballot

Class BallotParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • votebox.middle.ballot.BallotParser

  • public class BallotParser
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encapsulates the ballot XML parser. The ballot xml stores model content information -- information about races, candidates, ballot information, etc. This class's job is translate this information into a Ballot object. This class might be better thought of as a Ballot deserializer, but we have avoided this term so as not to mislead the reader into thinking that we are using java object serialization.

    To deserialize a Ballot object, this class first uses java's xerces wrapper to parse the ballot xml file into a w3c dom tree. This dom tree is first validated with our schema and then interpreted recursively from the top down.

    • Field Detail

      • _elements

        private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,SelectableCardElement> _elements
        As we parse the dom tree, when we encounter new card elements we add them to this hashmap. Each card element in this hash map is mapped by the string representation of its uid.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BallotParser

        public BallotParser()
        This is the public constructor for BallotParser. It does nothing.

    • Method Detail

      • getBallot

        public Ballot getBallot(IBallotVars vars)
                 throws BallotParserException
        This is the core method for the ballot parser. Call this method to translate a ballot xml file to a dom tree (as an intermediate representation), then, primarily, to a ballot object.
        Parameters:
        vars - The ballot parser will use this global parameters encapsulation to find where the ballot xml is stored.
        Returns:
        This method returns the Ballot object which represents our dom tree.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - This method throws an exception if the ballot parser encountered any problems translating the tree.
        BallotParserException

      • parseBallot

        private Ballot parseBallot(org.w3c.dom.Node node)
                    throws BallotParserException
        This method interprets a given dom node as being of the ballot type. This method will convert the given dom node to a Ballot object
        Parameters:
        node - This is the dom node that represents the ballot.
        Returns:
        This method returns the ballot object that is represented by the given dom node.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - This method throws an exception if the ballot parser encountered any problems translating the tree.
        BallotParserException

      • parseCard

        private Card parseCard(org.w3c.dom.Node node)
                throws BallotParserException
        This method is a helper method to parseBallot. It is called when a "Card" node is encountered in the dom tree.
        Parameters:
        node - This is the dom node that is a card node.
        Returns:
        This method returns the card that is represented by the given dom node.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - This method throws an exception if the ballot parser encountered any problems translating the tree.
        BallotParserException

      • parseElement

        private SelectableCardElement parseElement(org.w3c.dom.Node node)
                                    throws BallotParserException
        This method is a helper method to parseCard. It is called when a SelectableCardElement or CardElement is encountered in the dom tree.
        Parameters:
        node - This is the dom node which represents the element
        Returns:
        This method returns the new element which represents the given dom node.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - This method throws an exception if the ballot parser encountered any problems translating the tree.
        BallotParserException

      • parseWriteInElement

        private WriteInCardElement parseWriteInElement(org.w3c.dom.Node node)
                                        throws BallotParserException
        This method is a helper method to parseCard. It is called when a WriteInCardElement is encountered in the dom tree.
        Parameters:
        node - This is the dom node which represents the element
        Returns:
        This method returns the new element which represents the given dom node.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - This method throws an exception if the ballot parser encountered any problems translating the tree.
        BallotParserException

      • parseProperties

        private void parseProperties(org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                   Properties properties)
                      throws BallotParserException
        This is a helper method to parseBallot, parseCard, and parseElement. It is called when a dom node is encountered that represents a property. This method will add an entry representative of the given dom node to a given Properties object
        Parameters:
        node - This is the dom node which represents a property
        properties - This is the Properties object to which the given property should be added.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - This method throws an exception if the property has been defined with an incorrect type.
        BallotParserException

      • parseListProperties

        private void parseListProperties(org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                       Properties properties)
                          throws BallotParserException
        Given an XML node whose type is "ListProperty", add all its children to the given Properties instance.
        Parameters:
        node - This is the list property node.
        properties - Add the children of the given node to this properties instance.
        Throws:
        BallotParserException - If the XML is not formatted correctly, this method will throw.
